{value}

); const MessagesDashboard = () => { const [conversations] = useState([ { type: 'human', name: "Dr. Sarah Johnson", role: "Senior Care Manager", avatar: "/api/placeholder/100/100", lastMessage: "Urgent update on patient care protocol changes", time: "10m ago", status: "pending", priority: "high", category: "Care Protocol", unread: 2 }, { type: 'group', name: "Emergency Response Team", role: "Crisis Management", avatar: "/api/placeholder/100/100", lastMessage: "New emergency response guidelines implemented", time: "30m ago", status: "active", category: "Emergency", unread: 1 }, { type: 'ai', name: "AI Health Assistant", role: "System Monitor", lastMessage: "Anomaly detected in patient vital trends", time: "1h ago", status: "pending", category: "System Alert" } ]); return (
